x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: This Cultural Event Management application will help event management companies to plan, coordinate, and execute events efficiently. It offers real time collaboration to ensure smooth event delivery.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Big event management companies often require comprehensive digital platform designed to efficiently plan, organize, and execute various types of events such as conferences, weddings, corporate functions, and concerts. ServiceNow event management application can streamline the entire event lifecycle by providing tools for task management, vendor coordination, budget tracking, client collaboration, scheduling, and real-time updates. It also includes features like attendee management, venue booking, checklists, and reporting dashboards to ensure every aspect of the event runs smoothly. With multi-user support, role-based access, and mobile accessibility, the app empowers teams to collaborate effectively and deliver exceptional event experiences.

Knowledge Management – to store knowledge guides, policies, best practices.
